pkgmetadata.longdescription: MapEntity=========MapEntity is a CRUD interface for geospatial entities built with Django,that powers- `Geotrek <https://github.com/GeotrekCE/Geotrek-admin.fr>`_.- `Georiviere <https://github.com/Georiviere/Georiviere-admin>`_.Works with Python 3.8+ and Django 3.2+.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/mapentity.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/mapentity.. image:: https://github.com/makinacorpus/django-mapentity/actions/workflows/python-ci.yml/badge.svg.. image:: https://codecov.io/gh/makinacorpus/django-mapentity/branch/master/graph/badge.svg?token=lFNYhcVjuz :target: https://codecov.io/gh/makinacorpus/django-mapentity`See the full documentation <http://django-mapentity.readthedocs.org/>`_.=======AUTHORS=======|makinacom|_.. |makinacom| image:: https://github.com/makinacorpus.png.. _makinacom: https://www.makina-corpus.com=======LICENSE======= * BSD New
